type BoolToObjectConverter = class inherit DependencyObject interface IValueConverter

Docs.summary: This class converts a boolean value into an other object. Can be used to convert true/false to visibility, a couple of colors, couple of images, etc.

Docs.summary: Convert a boolean value to an other object.
Docs.returns: The value to be passed to the target dependency property.

Docs.summary: Convert back the value to a boolean
Docs.returns: The value to be passed to the source object.
Docs.remarks: If the parameter is a reference type, must match its reference to return true.
